meanings.definition: Not open to discussion or modification; essential.
meanings.sent1: Following the rules is nonnegotiable in this classroom.
meanings.sent2: Her safety is a nonnegotiable priority for her parents.
meanings.sent3: It's nonnegotiable that we wear helmets while riding bikes.
meanings.sent4: The foundation of trust is nonnegotiable in any relationship.
meanings.sent5: Good manners are nonnegotiable when meeting new people.

meanings.definition: Things that are considered essential and cannot be compromised.
meanings.sent1: In their family, honesty is one of the nonnegotiables.
meanings.sent2: Time management is one of the nonnegotiables for success.
meanings.sent3: For the camping trip, snacks were the nonnegotiables in the packing list.
meanings.sent4: Patience and perseverance are the nonnegotiables in achieving your goals.
meanings.sent5: Kindness and respect are nonnegotiables in their household.
